      • getAllRules

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableCollection<Rule> getAllRules()
        Returns all of the Rules defined in the database, sorted by display name (case insensitive).

      • getByDisplayName

        public Rule getByDisplayName(java.lang.String ruleName)
        Returns the persistent Rule with the given display name, or null if no such Rule exists.
        Returns:
        a persistent object: any changes made during the current transaction will automatically be persisted

      • getById

        public Rule getById(int ruleId)
        Returns the persistent Rule with the given ID, or null if no such Rule exists.
        Returns:
        a persistent object: any changes made during the current transaction will automatically be persisted

      • mergeRule

        public Rule mergeRule(Rule rule)

        Persists the given variable to the database using JPA merge semantics.

        As stated in getByDisplayName, changes are usually automatically persisted. Call this only to persist a brand-new object or to persist changes made after the transaction in which the object was loaded.

        Note that the given object is not added to the persistence context, but the returned object is. If you want to modify further state, use the returned object.

        Parameters:
        rule - represents the state to persist
